name: SRAM
overview:
SRAM is a textual adventure with graphics for the Amstrad CPC.

The name SRAM means MARS in reverse.

It was developed by Serge Hauduc, Ludovic Hauduc and Jacques Hémonic and published by ERE informatique.

It had a sequel called SRAM II. The game developers would later program QIN.

On the mysterious planet Sram, you must save king Egres, who has been imprisoned by an evil high priest.
